homeBanner.title: Frontend Web Developer
homeBanner.description: I am working on my new portfolio and I will be back with brand new styles very soon!

workExperience.desc1: Developed and maintained user-friendly and responsive web applications using React.js, Typescript and Vanilla Js. Collaborated closely with designers and backend developers to implement seamless user experiences.
workExperience.desc2: Hired for a limited duration for the migration from jQuery to React for an entire E-commerce App. Ensuring project completion with enhanced efficiency and sustainability.
workExperience.desc3: Designed and developed websites and e-commerce sites using WordPress and PrestaShop. Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness in site designs. Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and provide solutions for their online presence needs.

about.title: More about me
about.desc1: Thirst for knowledge, always looking forward to work with people and sort out any kind of problems. Def, I consider myself a team player. Always down for Volunteering and helping all beings.

balloon.description:
It is an e-commerce web application developed with cutting-edge technologies. This platform, built with React.js for the frontend and Node.js with Express.js for the backend, represents a milestone in my career as a developer.

The application offers users the opportunity to book unique experiences throughout the peninsula. Our primary focus was to provide a seamless and personalized booking experience. We implemented a wide range of features, from a ticket reservation system to an advanced filter that allows users to search for activities by category, city, price range, and available dates.

To enhance the user experience, we integrated libraries such as React Date Picker to simplify date selection and React Responsive Carousel to present images and activity details attractively.

This project was an exciting challenge that allowed us to showcase our web development skills and create an application that simplifies the search and booking of experiences.

about.title: About me
about.desc:
I embarked on this journey in 2011 when I immersed myself in the world of website development, crafting an E-commerce site for my company using Prestashop. During this time, I delved into the realms of HTML, CSS, and the fundamentals of JavaScript to make my websites more intelligent and efficient.
 After making the decision to close my company, I redirected my focus towards my passion, offering website development services to those in need.
 I also started building websites for everyone else who needed them after shutting down my company so I could focus full time on my passion.
 In 2021, I enrolled in a comprehensive JavaScript course covering both front-end and back-end development with React, Express JS, GIT, and SQL. It was during this course that I developed a deep appreciation for the React library and its rich ecosystem, ultimately deciding to specialize in it and hone my skills further.
 With an insatiable thirst for knowledge and a strong desire to collaborate with others to solve diverse challenges, I identify myself as a dedicated team player. I am always eager to volunteer and extend a helping hand to all living beings.
